attributes.action: The SAS hero who stormed Kenyan hotel should be awarded Victoria cross.
attributes.background: Although we don’t know his name, the SAS hero who ran into a hotel full of terrorists in Kenya. This bravery shows all the values that are awarded for the Vicctoris cross.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly and you can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
